pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Voliboli SGQLC Types## DistributeTo generate the distribution archives, run: python3 -m pip install --upgrade build python3 -m buildYou can then install this package locally from any other project using: pip install -e </path/to/root>where `root` is the top-level directory of this project.## New ReleaseTo deploy a new version you can use the following commands: twine upload --skip-existing dist/*
